argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | vcm.1 | |- G = ( 1st ` W ) |
| 2 |  | vcm.2 | |- S = ( 2nd ` W ) |
| 3 |  | vcm.3 | |- X = ran G |
| 4 |  | vcm.4 | |- M = ( inv ` G ) |
| 5 | 1 | #P_vcgrp | |- ( W e. CVecOLD -> G e. GrpOp ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( W e. CVecOLD /\ A e. X ) -> G e. GrpOp ) |
| 7 |  | #P_neg1cn | |- -u 1 e. CC |
| 8 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_vccl | |- ( ( W e. CVecOLD /\ -u 1 e. CC /\ A e. X ) -> ( -u 1 S A ) e. X ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_mp3an2 | |- ( ( W e. CVecOLD /\ A e. X ) -> ( -u 1 S A ) e. X ) |
| 10 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( GId ` G ) = ( GId ` G ) |
| 11 | 3, 10 | #P_grporid | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ ( -u 1 S A ) e. X ) -> ( ( -u 1 S A ) G ( GId ` G ) ) = ( -u 1 S A ) ) |
| 12 | 6, 9, 11 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( W e. CVecOLD /\ A e. X ) -> ( ( -u 1 S A ) G ( GId ` G ) ) = ( -u 1 S A ) ) |
| 13 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( W e. CVecOLD /\ A e. X ) -> A e. X ) |
| 14 | 3, 4 | #P_grpoinvcl | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X ) -> ( M ` A ) e. X ) |
| 15 | 5, 14 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( W e. CVecOLD /\ A e. X ) -> ( M ` A ) e. X ) |
| 16 | 3 | #P_grpoass | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ ( ( -u 1 S A ) e. X /\ A e. X /\ ( M ` A ) e. X ) ) -> ( ( ( -u 1 S A ) G A ) G ( M ` A ) ) = ( ( -u 1 S A ) G ( A G ( M ` A ) ) ) ) |
| 17 | 6, 9, 13, 15, 16 | #P_syl13anc | |- ( ( W e. CVecOLD /\ A e. X ) -> ( ( ( -u 1 S A ) G A ) G ( M ` A ) ) = ( ( -u 1 S A ) G ( A G ( M ` A ) ) ) ) |
| 18 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_vcid | |- ( ( W e. CVecOLD /\ A e. X ) -> ( 1 S A ) = A ) |
| 19 | 18 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( ( W e. CVecOLD /\ A e. X ) -> ( ( -u 1 S A ) G ( 1 S A ) ) = ( ( -u 1 S A ) G A ) ) |
| 20 |  | #P_ax-1cn | |- 1 e. CC |
| 21 |  | #P_1pneg1e0 | |- ( 1 + -u 1 ) = 0 |
| 22 | 20, 7, 21 | #P_addcomli | |- ( -u 1 + 1 ) = 0 |
| 23 | 22 | #P_oveq1i | |- ( ( -u 1 + 1 ) S A ) = ( 0 S A ) |
| 24 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_vcdir | |- ( ( W e. CVecOLD /\ ( -u 1 e. CC /\ 1 e. CC /\ A e. X ) ) -> ( ( -u 1 + 1 ) S A ) = ( ( -u 1 S A ) G ( 1 S A ) ) ) |
| 25 | 7, 24 | #P_mp3anr1 | |- ( ( W e. CVecOLD /\ ( 1 e. CC /\ A e. X ) ) -> ( ( -u 1 + 1 ) S A ) = ( ( -u 1 S A ) G ( 1 S A ) ) ) |
| 26 | 20, 25 | #P_mpanr1 | |- ( ( W e. CVecOLD /\ A e. X ) -> ( ( -u 1 + 1 ) S A ) = ( ( -u 1 S A ) G ( 1 S A ) ) ) |
| 27 | 1, 2, 3, 10 | #P_vc0 | |- ( ( W e. CVecOLD /\ A e. X ) -> ( 0 S A ) = ( GId ` G ) ) |
| 28 | 23, 26, 27 | #P_3eqtr3a | |- ( ( W e. CVecOLD /\ A e. X ) -> ( ( -u 1 S A ) G ( 1 S A ) ) = ( GId ` G ) ) |
| 29 | 19, 28 | #P_eqtr3d | |- ( ( W e. CVecOLD /\ A e. X ) -> ( ( -u 1 S A ) G A ) = ( GId ` G ) ) |
| 30 | 29 | #P_oveq1d | |- ( ( W e. CVecOLD /\ A e. X ) -> ( ( ( -u 1 S A ) G A ) G ( M ` A ) ) = ( ( GId ` G ) G ( M ` A ) ) ) |
| 31 | 17, 30 | #P_eqtr3d | |- ( ( W e. CVecOLD /\ A e. X ) -> ( ( -u 1 S A ) G ( A G ( M ` A ) ) ) = ( ( GId ` G ) G ( M ` A ) ) ) |
| 32 | 3, 10, 4 | #P_grporinv | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X ) -> ( A G ( M ` A ) ) = ( GId ` G ) ) |
| 33 | 5, 32 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( W e. CVecOLD /\ A e. X ) -> ( A G ( M ` A ) ) = ( GId ` G ) ) |
| 34 | 33 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( ( W e. CVecOLD /\ A e. X ) -> ( ( -u 1 S A ) G ( A G ( M ` A ) ) ) = ( ( -u 1 S A ) G ( GId ` G ) ) ) |
| 35 | 31, 34 | #P_eqtr3d | |- ( ( W e. CVecOLD /\ A e. X ) -> ( ( GId ` G ) G ( M ` A ) ) = ( ( -u 1 S A ) G ( GId ` G ) ) ) |
| 36 | 3, 10 | #P_grpolid | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ ( M ` A ) e. X ) -> ( ( GId ` G ) G ( M ` A ) ) = ( M ` A ) ) |
| 37 | 6, 15, 36 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( W e. CVecOLD /\ A e. X ) -> ( ( GId ` G ) G ( M ` A ) ) = ( M ` A ) ) |
| 38 | 35, 37 | #P_eqtr3d | |- ( ( W e. CVecOLD /\ A e. X ) -> ( ( -u 1 S A ) G ( GId ` G ) ) = ( M ` A ) ) |
| 39 | 12, 38 | #P_eqtr3d | |- ( ( W e. CVecOLD /\ A e. X ) -> ( -u 1 S A ) = ( M ` A ) ) |
